EmailTemplate.name: Generate HAR file
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Can you please generate a HAR file and send it over to help us continue troubleshooting? I want to check the network trace to see what could be going on. You can follow the steps below, or read directions here: 1. Open your browser’s Developer Tools. 2. Click the Network tab. 3. Refresh the page. 4. Make sure Preserve log is checked. 5. Reproduce the issue you’re experiencing. 6. Export the HAR file via the icon with the down arrow.
